MemoryInfobox.name: A Full Bladder
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Spies were said to hide messages inside unusual objects, including the dried bladder of a bear. A spy sought more dead bears for her messages.'

General_Description: '''A Full Bladder''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A spy for the [[Athens|Athenians]] required the aid of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra sought out the spy and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're the one who left the message on the [[Message board|board]]. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''I have an important message for the Athenian commander… It's concealed inside a dried [[bear]]'s bladder for complete secrecy.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Why are you hiding the message?'' *'''Woman:''' ''Because, ''misthios'', the message contains information on the [[Sparta]]ns' movements!
Unfortunately, this is my last bear bladder. I'll need more.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Does someone sell them?'' *'''Woman:''' ''I usually take them from dead bears I find in the forest. But they've been scarce lately, and I need to get this message to the commander.'' |-|You need it delivered.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to deliver it to the Athenian commander.'' *'''Woman:''' ''That's exactly it. Will you do it?'' |-|You want the bears killed.= (Accept - I'll handle it.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Good. Please handle this... delicately.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''We're done here.'' Kassandra left the woman, and found the commander. *'''Kassandra:''' ''A woman told me you’d be expecting this.'' *'''Man:''' ''Thank you, ''misthios''! Here, this is for you.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
